title: Anna's Amazing Adventure: A Fun Phonics Series #1
description: Anna and her baby sister Alicia are a pair of very hungry ants. Join Anna as she finds her favourite foods; apricots, acorn, apples and avocados, before learning that it's not finding the most that's important, but sharing with others. Help your child get a head-start and build essential English skills through this educational and engaging book. By introducing one phonic sound per book, this series teaches your child to correctly pronounce and read words in a fun and easy way. Be prepared to see your child's reading fluency, spelling ability and confidence skyrocket!
author: Little Geniuses
